title: Himi 224
lyrics:
M.L.
1.
Vakai ‘oku teu pekia,
‘A hotau kāinga lahi;
‘Oku tangi ‘a e ngaahi
Ta’ahine ‘a Sēlemi.
2.
Ko e fu’u po’uli lahi,
Kuo hoko ki he langi;
Pea tō ki he fonua,
‘A e fu’u ngalulu lahi.
3.
‘A e kau ma’oni’oni,
Ha’u, ‘o tangi lo’imata;
Ke tō ki he fatafata,
‘O hotau ‘Otua ‘ofa.
4.
Ko e toki ‘ofa eni,
Pea mo e fu’u mamahi,
Ke pekia ‘a e ‘Eiki
Ki he kakai tu’utāmaki.
5.
Kae vakai! ‘Iloange
Ko e me’a fiefia,
Ko Sīsū, na’e pekia;
‘Oku toetu’u hake.
6.
Ko e ‘Otua, ‘oku tu’u,
‘Oku li’ekina leva;
‘A e tanu’anga pea
‘Ikai, mata’ofi ia.
7.
Pea ‘ave ia ki ‘api,
‘E he ngaahi kau Sēlupi
Pea kalangaekina,
‘Ene hake ki he langi.*
